title: Vaibhavam Diamond Kada Bangles - A Touch of Sparkle
materials: 22K Gold Bangles with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Crafted with a traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: Classic Kada design with evenly spaced CZ stones in a prong setting. The symmetrical arrangement offers a modern twist to the traditional bangle. Simple, elegant and versatile.
colors: Radiant gold and dazzling white Cubic Zirconia stones.
occasions: or as an elegant addition to festive attire. Also suitable for gifting during special occasions like birthdays
description: These bangles showcase a beautiful balance of tradition and contemporary design. The high-quality CZ stones provide the sparkle of diamonds at an accessible price. Crafted with care, they are durable and long-lasting, perfect for everyday elegance.
